mean_cn: n. 懂多种语言的人；  adj. 使用多种语言的，懂几国文字的
mean_en: able to speak and understand several languages
word_etyma: multi很多+lingu语言+al形容词后缀→多种语言的
short_phrase: A multilingual person speaks many languages.
sentence: Our international youth hostel has a multilingual 'Welcome' sign.
sentence_trans: 我们的国际青旅有一个多种语言的“欢迎”标志。
